attributes.additional_details:
make marijuana legal for medical and recreational purposes

Take revenue from underground to actually contribute to our society

Smoking cigarettes and drinking alcohol has been proven to be detrimental to health and yet this is legal and yet smoking marijuana which is not as detrimental to health is classed as a class b drug. The logic does not hold 

let's reassess like many parts of the world have and make marijuana legal
attributes.background: I want legalising marijuana to be considered in Parliament. Considering how the rest of the world is legalising this isnt it time to reassess what we believe as being detrimental to health? Along with medicinal, recreational and monatary benefits to our society there is value in considering this.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318654
